title: Walk in closet, Fully equipped kitchen, 9ft ceilings, Space around!
map_address: 5301 Talbot Road S near Carr Road
posting_body: Apartments For Rent in Renton, Washington
Springbrook has spacious one and two bedroom apartments, and two bedroom, and three bedroom town homes.
Our community offers a theater room, fitness center, tanning bed, seasonal outdoor pool, and a year round hot tub.
With shopping, restaurants, and entertainment just minutes down the road you will sure love to call Springbrook home.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 795-854 Sq.
- So come on down to Springbrook Apartments and Townhomes and have a tour, you wont want to miss calling this place home!
We accept cats and dogs as long as they are not part of our breed restrictions list.
There is a maximum of 2 pets per home.
Call for information on applicable deposits and fees.
A minimum of 2.8 times the rental rate is required for all homes.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
